sentences.en: Fashion is gentility running away from vulgarity, and afraid of being overtake.
sentences.cn: 时髦,是逃亡自庸俗而又惟恐被?上的假斯文.

sentences.en: Fashion is gentility running away from vulgarity, and afraid of being overtaken.
sentences.cn: 时髦,是逃亡自庸俗而又惟恐被赶上假斯文.

sentences.en: GORING . Just as vulgarity is simply the conduct of other people.
sentences.cn: 戈林子 爵 正像庸俗只是别人的行为一样.

sentences.en: He was above the common and free from vulgarity.
His vulgarity made him unwelcome in our home.
sentences.cn: 他行为粗野,这使他在我们家不受欢迎.

sentences.en: How could the Jia family sink to such vulgarity?
I hate the vulgarity of this room.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这个房间的庸俗劲儿。

sentences.en: It is the uneducated vulgarity of expression at all.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是未受教育者的一种粗俗说法.

sentences.en: It's his vulgarity that I can't take.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍的是他的粗鄙。

sentences.en: She was offended by the vulgarity of their jokes.
sentences.cn: 他们那些粗俗的笑话使她大为不快。

sentences.en: Talking loudly on a bus is a sign of vulgarity.
sentences.cn: 在公共汽车上大声喧哗是一种粗鄙的行为.

sentences.en: The 29 - year - old comedian has a reputation for gender - bending costumes and occasional vulgarity.
sentences.cn: 这名29 岁 的喜剧演员以性别颠倒的着装以及不时的粗俗之举而出名.

sentences.en: There's a good deal of vulgarity.
Vulgarity is a very important ingredient in life.
sentences.cn: 庸俗是生活中非常必要的作料.

sentences.en: We chose alliteration on the theory a little vulgarity enhances memory.
sentences.cn: 在理论上我们选择有点儿粗俗的头韵来帮助记忆.

words.tran_cn: 粗俗；粗俗语；粗野的动作

trans.tran_cn: 庸俗，粗俗，粗野的行为，粗俗的话
trans.tran_en: the state or quality of being vulgar
